pageTitle: Ishan Jayaratne | Sri Lanka Cricket | Cricket Players and Officials | ESPN Cricinfo
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {18135=Feb 14, 2008, 14208=A right-arm seam bowler, Ishan Jayaratne has represented Sri Lanka Under-19s and Colts Cricket Club U-23s. A regular in the U-19 squad through 2007, he was selected for the World Cup in Malaysia the following year. An admirer of Sanath Jayasuriya, Jayaratne plans to be a musician if he doesn't make the grade as a professional cricketer. Cricinfo Staff February 2008, 34765=4391 runs after 35, and 2354 outside top five, 17260=Mar 30, 2013}
